p: Sukradiman et al. have demonstrated pinostrobinâ€™s antitumoral activity on the T47D human breast cancer cell line. Pinostrobin (10, 50 and 100 mg/mL) induced DNA fragmentation and increased the percentage of apoptotic cell. It also increased expression of p53, BAX, Caspase-3 and decreased BCL-2 expression [ 82].
